title: Bug 134949 - Themes nest in other library
description:
Bug 134949Themes nest in other library

Details:Themes nest in other library

Step:1.
OB: When I open the Library tree of A in the library explorer and attempt to drop the themes from B into the layout, an error message pops up. The error message informs me that the library namespace 'B' already exists.
EB: I expect to be able to nest the themes from library B within library A. I should be able to use this method.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Library tree of A in the library explorer.
2. Attempt to drop the themes from B into the layout.
3. Observe the error message that pops up, indicating that the library namespace 'B' already exists.
